evidence.source_document: Class Action Complaint and Demand for Jury Trial
evidence.text: 19. This action arises under the United States Constitution and 42 U.S.C. § 1983.

evidence.source_document: Fifth Amended Complaint and Jury Demand
evidence.text: 42 U.S.C. § 1985: Conspiracy to Deprive Plaintiffs of the Equal Protection of Laws

evidence.source_document: Class Action Complaint and Demand for Jury Trial
Fifth Amended Complaint and Jury Demand
evidence.text: 42 U.S.C. § 1985(3) provides that “[i]f two or more persons . . . conspire . . . for the purpose of depriving, either directly or indirectly, any person or class of persons of the equal protection of the laws . . .”
